pnp:ListInstance.Title: Site Assets
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Use this library to store files which are included on pages within this site, such as images on Wiki pages.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
INTRODUCING THE ALL NEW
Contoso Eagle

Packed with features you once thought possible only on much larger platforms into a
compact quadcopter that is snappy, agile, and captures stunning high-resolution 8K images.


the sky should not be the limit
?

EXPERIENCE OUR PRODUCT LINE IN
Mixed Reality

BREATHTAKING VIDEOS & PHOTOS

Contoso Eagle is the first drone to offer a 8K HDR camera that tilts vertically at an angle of 180?, combined with an up to 2.8X lossless zoom and a dolly zoom effect.

?

2.8X FULL HD ZOOM
The Dolly Zoom effect will reveal your inner filmmaker

FLYING IS A BREEZE

The easy-to-operate Eagle is designed for high-quality aerial photography and cinematography. Fly, capture and share photos and videos directly from the mobile app.

?

8K HDR VIDEOS AND 21 MP PHOTOS
Perfection is in the details

SMART & POWERFUL

Equipped with a smart battery that lasts up to 45 minutes and resists extreme temperatures the high-performance and super quiet drone can take everywhere. 

?

SLOW MOTION & HYPERLAPSE
Speed it up or slow it down, take control of time

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Contoso Electronics

—

the world changes when we change our perspective

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Introducing the Eagle 2 Pro Video Competition

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Use the new Eagle 2 Pro drone to shoot a video of your after work adventures, and potentially win a gift card to the company store as well as a one-on-one lunch with CEO Patti Fernandez.

This month there were great strides made in the development and growth of our new office in Singapore. We are 3 months away from moving the team into the new location and will have an update on the building and process soon.
Customer excitement is growing over our products. The pipeline for new customers continues to grow.
